What Makes Me Different?

I specialize in web design for small businesses and I do development for the whole South Africa. The reason I don't use WordPress and rather code everything from scratch is because I want optimal site performance and better search rankings for your site. I also offer 24/7 support and I am always available to make any edits to the site that you would want. I want to foster long-term relationships with my clients and grow with them.

Built from Scratch

My sites are built from scratch with HTML and CSS, which means faster load times and a better customer experience.
